title: Login issues
body: So I was logged in earlier to League of Leggings and I was off playing Monaco( Great game btw) because I was waiting for a friend and when we were done stealing stuff in that stupid game, we decided to hop into queue for some fun normal games (fun, kek). The next thing you know, the client starts bugging out, such as someone not accepting a game and the waiting for player loading thing stays there for a bit and when I cancel queue my status says still in queue. I tried re-logging into the game and from there on it was just, " Logging in to server..." I know it's probably on my shitty ISP, TPGs end. Was wondering if anyone else is going through the same problem?

replies.body: yup, same problem here, also with TPG
